name: Out of context
description:
A small game about being in a simple space.

This was made as I finished up a 3 month visit to the US in 2017. It  is bits and pieces of all the things I worked on while over there, and read/watched/listened to as well. It isn't a finished piece, but I doubt I will return to it at this stage. 

For the most part, this was my fist foray into shaders, and finding a 3D modeling style I am comfortable with.

Any and most all feed back is appreciated.

The list of things I listened/watched while working on this:
Friends at the table Season 1, COUNTER/Weight and Marielda.
Assorted Loading Ready Run.
Ping Pong the Animation OST
she - Electric Girl
Lophee
Odesza
Assorted music from Homestuck
